alert.note: Alert for Davidson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:51PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Slow-moving thunderstorms with locally very heavy rain and strong wind gusts will impact portions of central Davidson County through 845 PM EDT... At 748 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking slow-moving thunderstorms along a line extending from near Linwood to near High Rock Lake. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Linwood, Denton, High Rock Boat Dock Marina, NC Wildlife Access Boat Launch, High Rock Lake Marina & Campground, High Rock Lake and High Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall, with locally as much as two to three inches, is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
